Shane Parsons (DZ Deathrays)

Artist

Shane Parsons is the lead vocalist and guitarist from DZ Deathrays - a band that started out playing house parties, and have ended up as one of the most recognisable and loved rock acts in modern Australian music. The band has released five records, won two ARIA Awards and been nominated for two more. They have toured the world countless times, have supported The Foo Fighters on stadium tours; supported The Darkness across Europe, and have even collaborated with a Wiggle.
